Posts.Content: Nicole87 wrote: I am 21 years old and worried that I may have breast cancer. I have nearly all the symptoms of IBC and while my doctor didn't feel a lump IN my breast, I have had one on the outside right above my areola for nearly 2 weeks now. I am completely terrified.I have a mammogram scheduled for next Thursday and I guess will find out then. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 21 and scared Nicole87 desdemona222b

Posts.Content: May 15, 2009 12:08AM Nicole87 wrote: I keep telling myself that and I really hope it turns out for the best. Thing is, I don't have a lump in my breast atleast not that the doctor felt. I have 'classic' symptoms of IBC. The red bump that actually made me worry is one of the bigger symptoms according to my doctor. I also have 'swelling' of my right breast and it is noticebly larger than my left breast even though it hasn't always been that way. Along with swollen lymph nodes under my arm. Â  I will post the results as soon as I find them out. The next week is going to feel like an eternity.
